scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run prepare-assets && gh-pages -d dist
scripts.prepare-assets: mkdir -p dist/ttf dist/cursor dist/screens && curl -s -o 'dist/ttf/topaz.ttf' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rewtnull/amigafonts/ttf/Topaz_a500_v1.0.ttf && curl -s -o 'dist/ttf/TopazPlus.ttf' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rewtnull/amigafonts/ttf/TopazPlus_a1200_v1.0.ttf && cp -r public/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && touch dist/.nojekyll
